attributes.additional_details:
France managed to to cap the energy rises at 4%. The Tories think 54% is acceptable. Do you?

It's time to rise up. All of us. We HAVE to do something. We have to do it to for us, for our youth, and for elderly. We need a new government. 

It's time to rise up.
attributes.background:
This year, the United Kingdom has allowed it's citizens to face unprecedented engergy prices.

We are in an unprecedented situation, where the people of the UK are having to choose between food or heat. This is real.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you're concerned about the cost of energy, you might like to sign this petition:

Subsidise energy prices to offset any increase in the energy price cap: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586

If you want to see a change of Government, you might like to sign this petition:

Call for an early General Election for 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033
